mapping

Class FHEMConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapping.FHEMConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HomeAutomationServerConnector, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextClosedEvent>

    @Service
public class FHEMConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, HomeAutomationServerConnector, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.context.event.ContextClosedEvent>
    The Class FHEMConnector. This class connects the application to the home automation server FHEM. It retrieves device information via the FHEM command 'jsonlist2' and holds a websocket connection to FHEM to update at value changes.
